long_description: Versatile for weekend fun, the multisport Ahnu Inverness sandals support your feet on light hikes, all-day walks and water outings. Cushioned footbeds and EVA midsoles with arch support protect and support feet; soft linings enhance comfort. Lateral to medial thermoplastic urethane (TPU) heel clips and external shanks provide structure and stability and maintain a neutral foot position. Adjustable toe and instep webbing straps ensure a snug and secure fit; neoprene/mesh backing dries quickly, and disperses the load and alleviates pressure. Ahnu Inverness sandals have non-marking, nonslip rubber outsoles. Closeout.
short_description: Versatile for weekend fun, the multisport Ahnu Inverness sandals support your feet on light hikes, all-day walks and water outings.
